mapper.select: SELECT B.MNGR_BRD_ID , B.MNGR_BRD_TTL , B.MNGR_BRD_CNTNT , B.MNGR_ID , TO_CHAR(B.MNGR_BRD_WRT_DT ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MNGR_BRD_WRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , B.MDFYR , B.USE_YN , B.DEL_YN , M.MBR , M.MBR_NM , R.RPL_ID , R.RPL_CNTNT , R.MBR_ID R_MBR_ID , R.ALTCL_ID , R.RPL_PRNT_RPL , R.RPL_WRT_DT R_RPL_WRT_DT , R.MDFY_DT R_MDFY_DT FROM FRAN.MNGR_BRD B INNER JOIN MBR M ON B.MNGR_ID = M.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RPL R ON B.MNGR_BRD_ID = R.ALTCL_ID WHERE B.MNGR_BRD_ID = #{_parameter} START WITH R.RPL_PRNT_RPL IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR R.RPL_ID = R.RPL_PRNT_RPL
